title: Pixel 4 recording slow motion throws "Something went wrong. Part of this video may not be saved"
content:
I just received my Pixel 4 today. When I try to record a slow-motion video, an error appears after 3 seconds of recording: "Something went wrong. Part of this video may not be saved".

All my apps are up-to-date, I have 80% of battery and 80% of free space.

Is there something I can do to fix this?
